Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Chatham
Ward Four Fire Protection Dist. -- $40 Parcel Fee - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward Four Fire Protection District Proposition
(Parcel Fee Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Ward Four Fire Protection District of the Parish of Jackson, State of Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning the first day of January, 2017, a parcel fee on each parcel of immovable property as defined in Louisiana Revised Statute 40:1505(D) situated within the Ward Four Fire Protection District in the amount of $40.00 per year (an estimated $56,000.00 expected at this time to be collected from the parcel fee for an entire year) to be expended for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating fire protection and other first response facilities and equipment, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes and salaries of firemen, and all purposes incidental thereto?
